1a1('bum): (nya) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第八部
1b1('bum): @##/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig
1b2('bum): pa/ sa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
1b3('bum): bar stond/ sa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ sa'i khams myi sdug go zhes
1b4('bum): bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
1b5('bum): la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / sa'i khams myi rtag
1b6('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
1b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ sa'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
1b8('bum): sa'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
2a1('bum): de dag gi sa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sa'i khams myi
2a2('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams myi rtags go zhes bya bar ston/ chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo
2a3('bum): zhes bya bar stond/ /chu'i khams bdag myed do/ /zhes bya bar stond/ chu'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / chu'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i
2a5('bum): khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag chu'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo
2a6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
2a7('bum): ro/ /mye'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mye'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mye'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ mye'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di
2a8('bum): skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mye'i khams sdug bsngal zhes
2b1('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mye'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mye'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mye'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i
2b2('bum): khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
2b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rlung gi khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ rlung gi khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rlung gi khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad
2b4('bum): du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
2b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rlung gi khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams sdug
2b6('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
2b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ nam mkha'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ nam mkha'i khams
2b8('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / nam mkha'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
3a1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
3a2('bum): ro/ /de ltar de dag nam mkha'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nam mkha'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myi
3a3('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug
3a4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
3a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
3a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar
3a7('bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi sdug go
3a8('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ ma
3b1('bum): rig pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ ma rig pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / ma rig
3b2('bum): pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de
3b3('bum): ltar de dag ma rig pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ma rig pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ma rig pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
3b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'du
3b5('bum): byed myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'du byed myi rtag ces
3b6('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'du byed myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de
3b7('bum): ltar de dag 'du byed myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
3b8('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par
4a1('bum): shes pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su
4a2('bum): la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog
4a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa
4a4('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mying dang gzugs myi
4a5('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mying dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mying dang gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ mying dang gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang
4a6('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mying dang gzugs sdug zhes bya
4a7('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mying dang gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mying dang gzugs myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mying dang gzugs myi rtag go zhes bya bar
4a8('bum): rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi
4b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ skye mched drug sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ skye mched drug bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ skye mched drug myi sdug
4b2('bum): go zhes bya bar stonas cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes
4b3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag skye mched drug myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched drug sdug
4b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched drug bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched drug myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa myi
4b5('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ reg pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ reg pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
4b6('bum): pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /reg
4b7('bum): pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag reg pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa
4b8('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba
5a1('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshor
5a2('bum): ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag tshor ba myi rtag
5a3('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtogs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod
5a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sred pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sred pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ sred pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/
5a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / sred pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
5a6('bum): ro/ /sred pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag sred pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sred pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sred pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sred pa myi sdug
5a7('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /len pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ len pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ len pa bdag myed do zhes bya
5a8('bum): bar ston/ len pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / len pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
5b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /len pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /len pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /len pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag len pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / len pa
5b2('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / len pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / len pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar
5b3('bum): ston/ srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ srid pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ srid pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
5b4('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang / srid pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
5b5('bum): de ltar de dag srid pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha
5b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ skye ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ skye ba bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ skye ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /
5b7('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / skye ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
5b8('bum): skye ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag skye ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba
6a1('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rga
6a2('bum): shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rga shi bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rga shi myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan
6a3('bum): pa de dag kyang / rga shi myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag
6a4('bum): rga shi myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
6a5('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
6a6('bum): phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin
6a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag sbyin
6a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
6b1('bum): phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug
6b2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
6b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
6b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya
6b5('bum): bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug
6b6('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo
6b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
6b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
7a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go
7a2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya
7a3('bum): bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
7a4('bum): bar ston/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a5('bum): la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
7a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya
7a7('bum): bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a8('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan
7b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di
7b2('bum): skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam
7b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces
7b4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam
7b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
7b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes
7b7('bum): bya bar ston/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang /
7b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
8a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug
8a2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
8a3('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
8a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid
8a5('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
8a6('bum): rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ phyi stong pa
8a7('bum): nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
8a8('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur
8b1('bum): ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid sdug
8b2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /
8b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /
8b4('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
8b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
8b6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
8b7('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/
8b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong
9a1('bum): pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug
9a2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /
9a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
9a4('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa
9a5('bum): nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
9a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya
9a7('bum): bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
9a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed
9b1('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog
9b2('bum): pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dus
9b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go
9b4('bum): zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus
9b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar
9b6('bum): de dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas
9b7('bum): stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
9b8('bum): lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do
10a1('bum): zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
10a2('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
10a3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
10a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ mtha'
10a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
10a6('bum): pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mtha'
10a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
10a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thog
10b1('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
10b2('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
10b3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag
10b4('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi
10b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba myed
10b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dor
10b7('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dor ba
10b8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go
11a1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/
11a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang /
11a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug ces
11a4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang
11a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
11a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/
11a7('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar
11a8('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
11b1('bum): bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rang
11b2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
11b3('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug
11b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
11b5('bum): nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go
11b6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/
11b7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ zhes rjod de su bstan pa de dag kyang / myi myig pa stong pa nyid myi rtag
11b8('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi
12a1('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs
12a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa
12a3('bum): nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /
12a4('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug
12a5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dngos po myed pa stong pa
12a6('bum): nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go
12a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
12a8('bum): nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi
12b1('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
12b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug
12b3('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dngos
12b4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang /
12b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
12b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
12b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa
12b8('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi
13a1('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
13a2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi sdug ces bya
13a3('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
13a4('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/
13a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa
13a6('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog
13a7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag go zhes
13a8('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar
13b1('bum): rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul
13b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul
13b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
13b4('bum): pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
13b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams myi sdug go
13b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams sdug bsngal
13b7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dbang po rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog
13b8('bum): pa dang / dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi
14a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams myi
14a2('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stobs
14a3('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar
14a4('bum): rtog pa dang / stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
14a5('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed
14a6('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang /
14a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
14a8('bum): ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
14b1('bum): bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
14b2('bum): ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag
14b3('bum): myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan
14b4('bum): pa de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
14b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi
14b6('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i
14b7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/
14b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
15a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog
15a2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya
15a3('bum): bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
15a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/
15a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / bsam gtan rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
15a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag bsam
15a7('bum): gtan rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
15a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/
15b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
15b2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
15b3('bum): de ltar de dag tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug
15b4('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
15b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
15b6('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
15b7('bum): ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed
15b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
16a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go
16a2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ rnam par thar pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par
16a3('bum): thar pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag
16a4('bum): kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thar pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar
16a5('bum): pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam pa thar pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa
16a6('bum): rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i
16a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
16a8('bum): pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
16b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
16b2('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
16b3('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
16b4('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
16b5('bum): pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi
16b6('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
16b7('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du
16b8('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
17a1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
17a2('bum): smon pa myed pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa'i
17a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
17a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
17a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes
17a6('bum): pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan
17a7('bum): pa de dag kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed
17a8('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal
17b1('bum): lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod
17b2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi sdug go zhes
17b3('bum): bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal
17b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
17b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
17b6('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo
17b7('bum): rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs
17b8('bum): kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag
18a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi
18a2('bum): sgo rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
18a3('bum): stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad
18a4('bum): du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
18a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi
18a6('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
18a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
18a8('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/
18b1('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces
18b2('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog
18b3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
18b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
18b5('bum): bam po gnyis pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do
18b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang /
18b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bya
18b8('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par
19a1('bum): rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do/ /zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
19a2('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po bdag myed
19a3('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / snying rje chen po
19a4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
19a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag snying rje chen po myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po myi sdug go zhes
19a6('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
19a7('bum): bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
19a8('bum): do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi
19b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag go
19b2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
19b3('bum): pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug
19b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
19b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu
19b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
19b7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
19b8('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
20a1('bum): 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/
20a2('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
20a3('bum): 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
20a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
20a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
20a6('bum): 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan
20a7('bum): pa de dag kyang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
20a8('bum): 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
20b1('bum): bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra
20b2('bum): bcom pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
20b3('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
20b4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa
20b5('bum): nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
20b6('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing /
20b7('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang byang chub myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
20b8('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub bdag myed do zhes
21a1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang rang byang chub myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/
21a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
21a3('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya
21a4('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
21a5('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi sdug go zhes
21a6('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
21a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi
21a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog
21b1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
21b2('bum): pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
21b3('bum): nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
21b4('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
21b5('bum): sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu
21b6('bum): pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig /khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par
21b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
21b8('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa
22a1('bum): gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
22a2('bum): shig / khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang /
22a3('bum): sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig /khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
22a4('bum): pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang /
22a5('bum): sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshur rigs bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig /khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
22a6('bum): dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang /
22a7('bum): sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston ste/ de'i dus kyi 'du shes kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms par 'gyur
22a8('bum): te/ ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
22b1('bum): mo dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / nyan thos kyi sa
22b2('bum): las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
22b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
22b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis de ltar myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang
22b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa
22b6('bum): byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/
22b7('bum): 'di skad ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ bsod nams kyis phung po'i tshad
22b8('bum): myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am
23a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston ste/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
23a2('bum): kyis thugs dang po bskyed nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/
23a3('bum): rjes su dga' bar gyis la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyis bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
23a4('bum): brnyan ston to/ /brgya byin gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
23a5('bum): mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i
23a6('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig /gzugs myi rtag ces
23a7('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni/
23a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so/ /de la gzugs nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa'am myi
