89b5('bum): par byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
89b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i
89b7('bum): tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/
89b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs
90a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i
90a2('bum): tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing / yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
90a3('bum): rnams la spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ dbang po rnams la spyod cing / dbang po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan
90a4('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ stobs rnams la spyod cing / stobs de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing / byang
90a5('bum): chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang
90a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed
90a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing / bsam gtan de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ tshad myed pa rnams la spyod cing / tshad myed pa de dag
90a8('bum): kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
90b1('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing / rnam par thar pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
90b2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
90b3('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ mngon par shes pa
90b4('bum): rnams la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
90b5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
90b6('bum): stobs bcu la spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing / myi 'jigs pa bzhi
90b7('bum): po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan
90b8('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ snying rje chen po la spyod cing / snying rje chen po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod cing /
91a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing / thams cad shes pa nyid de
91a2('bum): yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma
91a3('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na/
91a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
91a5('bum): phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid
91a6('bum): la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang
91a7('bum): ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la
91a8('bum): mos pa mang ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
91b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
91b2('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / dbang po rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / stobs
91b3('bum): rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /
91b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang /
91b5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la mos pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba
91b6('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos pa mang ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / so so
91b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
91b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i de dag don dang ldan/ yi ge
92a1('bum): dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
92a2('bum): myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
92a3('bum): phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
92a4('bum): skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
92a5('bum): pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi
92a6('bum): bar du ci nas kyang / phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub
92a7('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / chen po stong pa
92a8('bum): nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed
92b1('bum): par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar
92b2('bum): myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud
92b3('bum): kyi bar du ci nas kyang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur
92b4('bum): ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / chos
92b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
92b6('bum): myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston
92b7('bum): to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
92b8('bum): dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du
93a1('bum): ci nas kyang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
93a2('bum): ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / stobs lnga dang
93a3('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed
93a4('bum): par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
93a5('bum): dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bsam gtan bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du
93a6('bum): ci nas kyang / tshad myed bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de
93a7('bum): ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /
93a8('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang /
93b1('bum): smon pa myed pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
93b2('bum): myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba
93b3('bum): de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du
93b4('bum): ci nas kyang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub
93b5('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / snying rje chen po dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
93b6('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ /de la bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston par 'gyur te/ des bdud kyi las de dag thos nas/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel pa myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
93b7('bum): bdud kyi las de dag la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ /
93b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
94a1('bum): kyi bar du nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la
94a2('bum): gsar du zhugs pas/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
94a3('bum): mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs mtshams re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa grangs myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
94a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul chad par gyur pa/ tshig gi lam nyams pa myi mnga' ba/
94a5('bum): khur bor ba/ grong gi tsher ma rab tu bstsal pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/ yang dag par yongs su mkhyen pas/ thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
94a6('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / de dag tu rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/
94a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan 'am/ 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/ tshangs ris sam/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs
94a8('bum): pa kun 'khor ram/ tshangs chen nam/ snang ba 'am/ chung snang ngam/ tshad myed snang ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba 'am/ dge ba 'am/ chung dge ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba 'am/ dge rgyas sam/ che ba 'am/ chung che 'am/
94b1('bum): tshad myed che ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba 'am/ myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba 'am/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams sam/ sus kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa de
94b2('bum): dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas/ tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/ mchog phul/ gtso bo/ gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/
94b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar
94b4('bum): bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
94b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems shing bsams nas/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/ mchog
94b6('bum): phul/ gtso bo/ gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
94b7('bum): bsngo bar byed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyi ci log du myi 'gyur ba yin/ sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ba yin/ lta ba phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor
94b8('bum): kyis smras pa/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/ sems kyang / de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par myi
95a1('bum): 'gyur/ nyan thos su 'du shes par myi 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par myi 'gyur zhing / sems gang gis yongs su sngo ba'i sems de la yang sems gyi 'du shes su myi 'gyur na/ de ltar yongs
95a2('bum): su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do/ /sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
95a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la/ mtshan mar bzung nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
95a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /
95a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems dpa'i sems de la yang /
95a6('bum): yang dag par sems shing / 'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la/ gang zad pa des yongs su bsngo bar myi nus te/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de nyid kyi chos nyid kyang de yin la/ chos
95a7('bum): gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/ gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ yang dag par yongs su sngo ba ste/ log pa ma yin no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
95a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed nas/ dam pa'i
95b1('bum): chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / de dag tu so so'i skye bo mang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang / chos
95b2('bum): bstan pa gang ji snyed cig thos pa dang / de dag tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig
95b3('bum): bskyed pa dang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/ sum cu rtsa
95b4('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams sam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams sam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs lha
95b5('bum): nye phan gyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams sam/ snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung snang gi lha rnams sam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha
95b6('bum): rnams sam/ dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams sam/ che ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung che'i lha rnams sam/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams sam/
95b7('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams sam/ myi che ba'i lha rnams sam/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams sam/ gya nom sna ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
95b8('bum): ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos ji snyed cig thos te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas/ tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i
96a1('bum): rab mchog / phul dam pa/ gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/ de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
96a2('bum): yongs su sngo zhing / gal te 'di ltar chos de dag ni zad do/ /'gags so/ /myed do/ /rnam par gyur to/ /gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes/ gal te de ltar yongs su
96a3('bum): sngo na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ltar chos kyis chos yongs su bsngo bar myi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya
96a4('bum): bar shes la/ gal te de ltar yongs su sngo na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
96a5('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
96a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
96a7('bum): yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa myed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang mngon par chags pa myed do/ /byang chub de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang yang
96a8('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na myed pa'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/ phung po
96b1('bum): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gyis dben par shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/
96b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/ nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/
96b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/
96b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ rang bzhin
96b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
96b6('bum): dben par shes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dben par
96b7('bum): shes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ dbang po rnams kyis dben par shes/ stobs rnams kyis dben par shes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis dben par shes/ 'phags pa'i
96b8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ bsam gtan rnams kyis dben par shes/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
97a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis dben par shes/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus dben par shes rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
97a2('bum): dang smon pa myed pas dben par shes/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis dben par shes/ gzungs kyis sgo rnams kyis dben par shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
97a3('bum): bcus dben par shes/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis dben par shes/ so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhis dben par shes/ byams pa chen pos dben par shes/ snying rje chen pos dben par shes/ sangs rgyas
97a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi dben par shes na/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
97a5('bum): yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i
97a6('bum): dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis
97a7('bum): dben no/ /mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /byang chub kyi sems de ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /yongs su bsngo ba ni/ yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid
97a8('bum): kyis dben no/ /byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
97b1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dben no/ /tshul
97b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /nang stong pa
97b3('bum): nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa
97b4('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa
97b5('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis dben no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /thog ma
97b6('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /chos thams
97b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
97b8('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/
98a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis
98a2('bum): dben no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /stobs rnams ni stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
98a3('bum): rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags
98a4('bum): pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /bsam gtan rnams ni/ bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni/ tshad myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
98a5('bum): ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ rnam par thar pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/
98a6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
98a7('bum): smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
98a8('bum): ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /so so
98b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/ /zhes bya bar shes na/
98b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub
98b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo
98b4('bum): bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar de bzhin du yongs su sngo ba 'di
98b5('bum): yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de yang de dang tshul mthun te/ de'i ngo bo nyid do zhes/ gal te de ltar shes na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin
98b6('bum): te/ de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
98b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no/ /'das pa'i
98b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no zhes/ gal te de ltar sems na yang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
99a1('bum): su bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas
99a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa myed cing / mtshan mar myi byed na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par
99a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro/ /lta ba phyin ci log tu
99a4('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ /byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mtshan mar myi byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
99a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag bslab par bya ste/
99a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su
99a7('bum): bsngo bar myi nus so/ /byams pas smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang myed de/ myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang /
99a8('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang myed de/ myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang myed de/ myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smras par
99b1('bum): myi 'gyur ram snyam na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/ dge
99b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/ mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/ sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par gyur na/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
99b3('bum): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / rnam par rtog pa lta de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ de ltar mtshan ma'i
99b4('bum): tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang / mngon par bsngags pa ma mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing / rnam par
99b5('bum): rtog ste/ dmyigs pa ni de'i dmyigs pa chen por 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas myi dmyigs shing / mtshan ma myed par byas te/ yongs
99b6('bum): su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
99b7('bum): yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can/ zug rngu can te/ 'di ltar dper na/ kha zas bsod pa/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang / dug dang 'dres par gyur na/ kha dog dang / dri dang ros yid du 'ong ba yang yin
99b8('bum): mod kyi/ 'on kyang dug can du zad na de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i ngang tshul can ni/ bza' bar sems te/ des de zos na yang kha dog dang / dri dang / ro zhim par tshor mod kyi/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smyin
100a1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du log par rig pa dang / log par shes pa dang / log par bslabs pa la don ma rtogs myi shes shing 'di skad du ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
100a2('bum): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dang / phung
100a3('bum): po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par gyur kyi bar du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig mngon
100a4('bum): par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par

101b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang / nyan thos de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa myed pa rnams dang / gang gis der dge

102a1('bum): cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul la tshad bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces bya bar ston te/ de ltar bsngo ba des/

102a3('bum): bsngo ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmyigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rgyu dang bcas pa/ rkyen dang bcas pa ste/ de de ltar yongs su bsngos na/
102a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin/ chos bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la byang chub

104a7('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur bar
104a8('bum): 'gyur ba myed par 'dod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na myed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi ngang tshul gang yin pa
104b1('bum): dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa thugs su chud de/ mkhyen la rab tu mkhyen cing / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs
104b2('bum): su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag
104b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byas te/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur bar myi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba dang / chos bzhin du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /
104b4('bum): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba de dug myed cing / bdud rtsi'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
104b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ ji ltar gzugs 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud

110a4('bum): yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi yongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud
110a5('bum): pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa
110a6('bum): ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs

110b1('bum): no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs

110b7('bum): pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i
110b8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/
111a1('bum): ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su

115a8('bum): bar myi nus so/ /yid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/
115b1('bum): da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed

115b4('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sgra gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi
115b5('bum): khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
115b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dri gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
115b7('bum): khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
115b8('bum): yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
116a1('bum): ro gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma
116a2('bum): yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni

121a2('bum): ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa ste/
121a3('bum): dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /srid pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/
121a4('bum): ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa
121a5('bum): de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /skye ba gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa
121a6('bum): de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang
121a7('bum): bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rga shi gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
121a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
121b1('bum): yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
121b2('bum): gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/
121b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshul khrims
121b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan
121b5('bum): ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo
121b6('bum): bar myi nus so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/

121b8('bum): dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa

126a8('bum): de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i
126b1('bum): khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
126b2('bum): gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi

131b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag
131b2('bum): par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba des ni/
131b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par myi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par myi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su
131b4('bum): smyin par ma gyur pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ /
131b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis
131b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na/ yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
131b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor de
131b8('bum): ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul
132a1('bum): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
132a2('bum): kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te stong
132a3('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob par gyur/ gzugs
132a4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
132a5('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags
132a6('bum): pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de lta na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ rab ces
132a7('bum): bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
132a8('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur/ dgra bcom par gyur te/ de la
132b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dgra bcom par gyur pa de dag thams cad
132b2('bum): la nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
132b3('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
132b4('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed par yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de
132b5('bum): ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /
132b6('bum): bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur
132b7('bum): te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/
132b8('bum): mchod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /
133a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches
133a2('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /
133a3('bum): gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa
133a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
133a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/
133a6('bum): bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas / mchod par byas ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji
133a7('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal
133a8('bum): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
133b1('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /
133b2('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
133b3('bum): byas pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos
133b4('bum): dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/
133b5('bum): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems cad ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/
133b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror
133b7('bum): byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
133b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /
134a1('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
134a2('bum): bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134a3('bum): chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bsti byas/ phu dud du byas/
134a4('bum): mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yod byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
134a5('bum): thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/

134a7('bum): snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /

134b1('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms
134b2('bum): dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
134b3('bum): kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar
134b4('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o/ /bcom ldan
134b5('bum): 'das gal te bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
134b6('bum): pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo
134b7('bum): bas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/
134b8('bum): rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor chags pa myed pa'i
135a1('bum): yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /
135a2('bum): bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do/ /
135a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
135a4('bum): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no/ /de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /
135a5('bum): sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /
135a6('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi
135a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te/ thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems
135a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul
135b1('bum): gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/
135b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
135b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal
135b4('bum): mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /
135b5('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /
135b6('bum): 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa
135b7('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing ci nas kyang / gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar
135b8('bum): yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/
136a1('bum): de nas lha'i bu rab mtshe ma mtshe ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
136a2('bum): byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas
136a3('bum): kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal
136a4('bum): mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs
136a5('bum): mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /
136a6('bum): ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i bu rab
136a7('bum): dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /

136b1('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
136b2('bum): la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis

136b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i rab 'phrul dga' 'phrul
136b5('bum): dga'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
136b6('bum): na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /
136b7('bum): lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /
136b8('bum): rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
137a1('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang /
137a2('bum): gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i bu dbang byed gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
137a3('bum): kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
137a4('bum): na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng
137a5('bum): ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan
137a6('bum): 'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma
137a7('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur
137a8('bum): ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
137b1('bum): du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137b2('bum): phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa/ dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyi
137b3('bum): mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
137b4('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu
137b5('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa/ dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /
137b6('bum): de nas dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub
137b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan
137b8('bum): pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
138a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
138a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis
138a3('bum): mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
138a4('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs
138a5('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas
138a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan
138a7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag gal te stong
138a8('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
138b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems pa dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi
138b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol
138b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/
138b4('bum): bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
138b5('bum): phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rjes su yi rang bar byas la/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas kyang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa
138b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ des 'das pa dang /
138b7('bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dag gi/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
138b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
139a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas
139a2('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan
139a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/
139a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/
139a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i
139a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
139a7('bum): sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'am/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun tu zhugs
139a8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
139b1('bum): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i
139b2('bum): tshul du/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa
139b3('bum): dang / myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags
139b4('bum): pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag
139b5('bum): bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang /
139b6('bum): bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang myi bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs su myed
139b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ mchog ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam
139b8('bum): pa myed pa zhes bya'o/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
140a1('bum): bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa
140a2('bum): dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byed do zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam
140a3('bum): gyis na/ rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ ji tsam gyis na/ rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma
140a4('bum): mchis pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs

140a6('bum): 'jum zhing dmyigs par yang ma yin/ myi dmyigs par yang ma yin la/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang myed/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba
140a7('bum): yang myed/ de chos de dag la 'grib pa yang myed/ 'phel ba yang myed/ 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed/ phung por 'gyur ba yang myed do zhes rnam grangs de lta bus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
140a8('bum): ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rjes su
140b1('bum): yi rang nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de
140b2('bum): dag ni/ gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba 'di la
140b3('bum): ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong
